overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains an active presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky with a total of 3,580 followers. His posts predominantly focus on research, methodological advancements, and career opportunities in computational social science. The engagement levels vary across platforms, with LinkedIn showing the highest interaction in terms of likes and comments.
